speech: Our Nail Art & Extension courses range in duration, from 1-week basic programs to 3-month comprehensive certifications. For instance, the 3D Nail Art course is shorter, while the full Nail Art and Extension program requires a few weeks.

The duration of our nail art courses varies. We offer short-term options for basic training that lasts about a week, while more advanced programs in nail extensions and 3D art can take up to 3 months. Are you interested in a particular course duration?

We have flexible durations for our nail courses, with options like a 1-week introductory course and an extended 3-month certification program. Schedules are available for both weekdays and weekends. Let me know if youâ€™d like more information on a specific course schedule.

Our nail styling courses are designed to fit different time commitments. Shorter courses in basic nail art can be completed in a week, while advanced training, like the 3D Nail Art program, may take a few weeks to a few months.
We offer nail courses that range from 1-week introductory sessions to more intensive 3-month programs. There are flexible scheduling options for both weekdays and weekends.
